NoticeData.Contents: Game Improvements - Block creation time will be stabilized through the libplanet update. - Improved food usage UX: - In the inventory, food with the same ID will no longer be displayed individually. Instead, the quantity will be shown to make it easier to use and check. - In the PC version of the shop, the UX has been improved to allow multiple food items with the same ID to be listed for sale at once.

Ruby Summon Update - Ruby Aura and Ruby Rune summon using Ruby Dust has been added. - Similar to the existing Golden Dust Rune summon, but the summoning probabilities for runes are different. Check if the probability for the rune you wanted has increased! - Detailed information on summon composition and probabilities can be found in Workshop - Summon. New Auras and Runes Added - Three new Ymir Auras, including a Sacred grade, have been added. Ymir Auras can be obtained in three grades: Unique, Legendary, and Sacred. Ymir Auras can be obtained through Golden Aura and Ruby Aura summon in Workshop - Summon menu. - Two new Sacred grade Odin Runes have been added. These runes, along with future Sacred grade rune shards, will have the untradable attribute. These runes can be obtained through Golden Rune and Ruby Rune summon in Workshop - Summon menu. June Event - Golden Dust and AP Potions have been added to the reward items for patrol rewards. - The waiting block required for new equipment craft is reduced by 30%. - Golden Dust will be distributed to players above level 250. Ruby Guardian Pass Update - The Ruby Guardian Pass, which allows you to obtain the Ruby Guardian title, has been released. - The Ruby Guardian title grants outstanding stats with HP 63,114 and SPD 20,872. Game Improvements - Some collections have had their rewards enhanced. - Some new collections have been added. - Rare, Epic, and Unique grade auras have been added to the Normal Aura summon section in Workshop - Summon. - A feature to import your QR code-shaped key has been added to the game start screen. Bug Fixes - Fixed a bug where the animation speed slowed down after the World Boss event. - Fixed a bug where some users did not see the 8th World Quest in Odin Chain.

Rune Level Bonus System Update - A Rune Level Bonus system has been updated, which applies a stat bonus to equipped runes based on the total level of all runes. - Receive bonuses ranging from a minimum of 30% up to a maximum of 1000%! It's a great opportunity to level up your runes. - Detailed explanations will be provided through Medium. Multi-Level Rune Upgrade Feature Update - Improved to allow leveling up to a maximum of 30 rune levels at once! - The success rate for all rune enhancements has been changed to 100%! - For levels previously under 80%, the upgrade costs have been adjusted to match the 100% standard. Addition of 2 New Runes - Two new Sacred-grade runes have been added: - One skill rune and one stat rune, detailed specs can be checked through Medium. - These runes, including future Sacred-grade rune stones, are non-tradable. - These runes can be obtained through Workshop - Summon - Golden Rune Summon. May Event - Rune Level Bonus Update Celebration Event - Throughout May, the world bosses Odin and Heimdall will continue without breaks. - World boss battle rewards & grade rewards for rune stones will increase by 1.5 times. - Crystal Equipment Material Drop Event - During the event period, stages 150, 200, 250, and 300 will drop crystal equipment materials instead of usual materials. - Use these materials to craft crystal equipment and grind to obtain crystals, which will be a great help on your future adventures. - Detailed probabilities and explanations about crystal equipment can be checked through Medium. Season Pass Rune Master (May 2024) Update - A season pass that allows you to obtain the title of Rune Master has been updated. - The Rune Master title is designed to provide excellent support in adventure missions. - For premium pass users, there is a new feature to receive unclaimed rewards from the previous season for a week after the new season starts. Game Improvement - Stage rebalancing from stage 151 to 359 to aid adventurers in entering the 8th world. - Adjustments made to reduce the number of blocks required for enhancing 8th world equipment. - A correction was made to the def stat of some 8th world ring equipment which was incorrectly configured. - Some collections have been upgraded and new collections have been added. - A feature to back up the key file containing account information on the mobile start screen has been added. - Equipment tooltips now display the experience held by the equipment. - Before crafting, the equipment recipe now shows the experience the equipment will hold initially. - The recipe section displays the number of related collections and the achievement numbers. - The crystal acquisition calculation from equipment grinding has been changed. - It increases up to 5 enhancements, and thereafter, the same amount as 5 enhancements will be granted. - The maximum pure acquisition per piece of equipment is limited to 100 million crystals, excluding the staking bonus. Bug Fixes - Fixed an issue where arena ticket information was not updating properly after use. - Fixed an issue where personal information was not updating properly in the arena list. - Fixed an issue where the actual outcome and the simulation during stage progression were different.
